;; Case 0147: L=2126, k1=anuvft, code=€, mw=anuvft anu+vft
{#anuvft#}¦ €1A. (sometimes P. also)
.²1 (Transitively used)
.³(a) To go or roll after, follow, pursue; (fig.) to follow, conform
 to, act according to, obey, adapt oneself to, be guided by; humour; {#ahaM#}
 {#tAvatsvAminaSci‡ttavfttimanuvartizye#} Ś. 2; {#te'pi paricayamanuvartante#}

 of her choice; {#lOkikAnAM hi sADUnAmarTaM vAganuvartate#} U. 1. 10 words
 conform to the sense; {#na kulakamamanuvartate#} K. 104 follow; {#maDu#}
 {#dvirePaH kusumEkapAtre papO priyAM svAmanuvartamAnaH#} Ku. 3. 36 followed
 his mate in drinking, drank after her; ({#jananIm#}) 
[Page0108-2]
 {#atyantaSudDa#}‡{#hfdayAmanuvartamAnAm#} Bh. 2. 110; {#mama vartmAnuvartante#}
 {#manuzyAH pArTa sarvaSaH#} Bg. 3. 23; Dk. 80, 96, 126; {#kftajYatAmanuvartamAnena#}

.²6 To be able, translatable by, ‘can’; {#na me vacanamanyaTA Bavitumarhati#}
 Ś. 4; {#vinASamavyayasyAsya na kaScitkartumarhati#} Bg. 2. 17; {#anudyogena#}
 {#tElAni tileByo nAptumarhati#} H. Pr. 30 cannot get.
.²7 To worship, honour; see caus. below.
.²8 (Used with inf. in the second pers. and sometimes in the third) {#arh#}
 represents a mild form of command, advice or courteous request, and may
 be translated by ‘pray’, ‘deign’, ‘be pleased to’, will be pleased to';
 {#dvitrARyahAnyarhasi soQumarhan#} R. 5. 25 pray wait &c. {#nArhasi me#}
 {#praRayaM vihantum#} 2. 58; {#taM santaH Srotumarhanti#} 1. 10 will be 
pleased or be good enough to listen to it; Ku. 6. 32; Ms. 1. 2; Bg. 10.
 16, 2. 17; R. 1. 72; 1. 88; 3. 46. -Caus. or 10 P. To honour, 
worship. {#rAjArjihattaM maDuparkapARiH#} Bk. 1. 17; Ms. 3. 3. 119.

;; Case 0425: L=4754, k1=av, code=€, mw=av
{#av#}¦ €1P. [{#avati, Ava, AbIt, avizyati, avitum, avita#} or {#Uta#}]

 are assigned to this root, but they are very rarely used in classical

consume, devour. -- With {#anu#} to encourage, inspire.
.{#-ud#}
.²1 to regard, attend to.
.²2 to wait for.
.²3 to promote, impel.
.{#-upa#}

.²2 to encourage.
.{#-sam#}

.²2 to protect, maintain. [cf. L. aveo].

{#nu Kalu yaTA vayamasyAmevamiyama‡pyasmAn prati syAt#} Ś. 1. {#astu#} well,
 let it be; {#evamastu, taTAstu#} so be it, amen. The form {#Asa#} joined
 to roots in forming their periphrastic perfect is sometimes separated 
from the root and used by itself; {#taM pAtayAM praTamamAsa papAta paScAt#}
 R. 9. 61, 16. 86. [cf. L. est and Gr. esti. with {#asti;#} esse;
 Zend. āsti; Pers. hast, ast] With {#ati#} 
[Page0286-1]
 to be over, excel, surpass.
.{#-anu#} to be at hand; reach.
.{#-api#} (with loc. or an adv. of place)
.²1 to be in anything.
.²2 to belong to, be closely connected with.
.{#-aBi#}
.²1 to belong to, to fall to one's share; {#yanmamamABi‡zyAt#} Sk.
.²2 to be over.
.²3 to excel, surpass.
.²4 to domineer or to tyrannize over, rule over.
.{#-Avis#} to arise, spring up, be visible; {#AcAryakaM vijayi mAnmaTa‡mAvirAsIt#} Māl. 1. 26.
.{#-upa#} to be near to or in.
.{#-pari#}
.²1 to be in the way.
.²2 to surpass.
.²3 to pass or spend (time).
.²4 to pervade.
.{#-pra#}
.²1 to be in front of.
.²2 to be in extraordinary degree, to preponderate, excel, surpass.
.{#-prati#}
.²1 to be equal to, be a match for.
.²2 to rival, emulate, vie with.
.²3 to be a representative of, stand in place of.
.{#-prAdus#} to appear, spring up; {#prAdurAsIttamonudaH#} Ms. 1. 6; R. 11. 15.
.{#-vyati#} (Atm. {#vyatihe, vyatise; vyatiste#}) to excel, surpass,
 be above or superior to, out-weigh; {#anyo vyatiste tu mamApi DarmaH#} Bk. 2. 35.
.{#-as#} II. 4. P. ({#asyati, Asa, AsTat, asitum, asta#})
.²1 To throw, cast, hurl, discharge, shoot (with loc. of the mark); {#haste#}
 {#biBarzyastave#} Śvet. Up. 3. 6; {#tasminnAsTadizIkAstram#} R. 12. 23;
 Bk. 15. 91, 14. 77; sometimes with dat. or gen. {#dasyave hetimasya#} Rv. 1. 103. 3.
.²2 To drive away. remove.
.²3 To frighten or scare away.
.²4 To throw or take away, let go, leave, give up; as in {#astamAna, astaSoka,#}
 {#astakopa#} see {#asta#}.
.²5 To fight with; {#yuyoDa valirindreRa tArakeRa guho'‡syata#} Bhāg. 
8. 10. 28. -With {#ati#} to shoot beyond or at, overpower (with arrows);
 {#atyasta#} having shot beyond, having surpassed or excelled; joined in
 acc. (Tat. comp.; P. II. 1. 24.)
.{#-aBipra#} to throw over or upon, hurl at.
.{#-parini#} to stretch.
.{#-as#} III. 1 U. ({#asati-te, asita#}).
.²1 To go.
.²2 To take or receive, seize.
.²3 To shine (The examples usually cited to illustrate this sense are:--
 {#nizpraBaSca praBurAsa BUBftAm#} R. 11. 81; {#tenAsa lokaH pitfmAn vinetrA#}
 14. 23; {#lAvaRya utpAdya ivAsa yatnaH#} Ku. 1. 35. But the sense of {#didIpe#}
 or 'shone' is far-fetched, though Vāmana is disposed to take it. It seems
 preferable to regard {#Asa#} in these instances as equivalent to {#baBUva,#}
 either taking it, as Śākaṭāyana does, as an indeclinable {#tiNantaprati‡rUpakamavyayam,#}
 or considering it, as Vallabha does, as an ungrammatical form used against
 the rules of grammar, {#prAmAdikaH prayogaH;#} see Malli. on Ku. 1. 35).

;; Case 1208: L=12757, k1=kf, code=C, mw=kf
{#kf#}¦ I. 5 U. ({#kfRoti-kfRute#}) To hurt, injure, kill. --II. 8 U. 
({#karoti-kurute, cakAra-cakre, akArzIt-akfta; kartum, karizyati-te kfta#})
.²1 To do (in general); {#tAta kiM karavARyaham#}
.²2 To make; {#gaRikAmavaroDamakarot#} Dk; {#nfpeRa cakre yuvarAjaSabdaBAk#}
 R. 3. 35; {#yuvarAjaH kftaH#} &c.
.²3 To manufacture, shape, prepare; {#kumBakAro GawaM karoti; kawaM karoti#} &c.
.²4 To build, create; {#gfhaM kuru; saBAM kuru madarTe BoH#}.
.²5 To produce, cause, engender; {#ratimuBayaprArTanA kurute#} Ś. 2. 1.
.²6 To form, arrange; {#aYjaliM karoti; kapotahastakaM kftvA#}.
.²7 To write, compose; {#cakAra sumanoharaM SAstram#} Pt. 1.
.²8 To perform, be engaged in; {#pUjAM karoti#}.
.²9 To tell, narrate; {#iti bahuviDAH kaTAH kurvan#} &c.
.²10 To carry out, execute, obey; {#evaM kriyate yuzmadAdeSaH#} Māl. 1;
 or {#karizyAmi vacastava#} or {#SAsanaM me kuruzva#} &c.
.²11 To bring about, accomplish, effect; {#satsaM‡gatiH kaTaya kiM na karoti#}
 {#puMsAm#} Bh. 2. 23.
.²12 To throw or let out, discharge, emit; {#mUtraM kf#} to discharge urine,
 make water; so {#purIzaM kf#} to void excrement.
.²13 To assume, put on, take; {#strIrUpaM kftvA; nAnArUpARi kurvARaH#} Y. 3. 162.
.²14 To send forth, utter; {#mAnuzIM giraM kftvA, kalaravaM kftvA#} &c.
.²15 To place or put on (with loc.); {#kaRWe hArama‡karot#} K. 212; {#pARimurasi kftvA#} &c.
.²16 To entrust (with some duty), appoint; {#aDyakzAn viviDAnkuryAttatra#}
 {#tatra vipaScitaH#} Ms. 7. 81.
.²17 To cook (as food) as in {#kftAnnam#}.
.²18 To think, regard, consider; {#dfzwistfRIkftajagattrayasattvasArA#} U. 6.
 19.
.²19 To take (as in the hand); {#kuru kare gurumekamayoGanaM#} N. 4. 59.
.²20 To make a sound, as in {#KAtkftya, PUtkftya BuNkte;#} so {#vazawkf, svAhAkf#} &c.
.²21 To pass, spend (time); {#varzARi daSa cakruH#} spent; {#kzaRaM kuru#} wait a moment.
.²22 To direct towards, turn the attention to, resolve on; (with loc. or
 dat.); {#nADarme kurute manaH#} Ms. 12.
 118; {#nagaragamanAya matiM na karoti#} Ś. 2.
.²23 To do a thing for another (either for his advantage or injury); {#prAptAgninirvApaRagarvamambu#}
 {#ratnAN‡kurajyotizi kiM karoti#} Vikr. 1. 18;
 18; {#yadanena kftaM mayi, asO kiM me karizyati#} &c.
.²24 To use, employ, make use of; {#kiM tayA kriyate DenvA#} Pt. ?1.
.²25 To divide, break into parts (with adverbs ending in {#DA#}); {#dviDA#}
 {#kf#} to divide into two parts; {#SataDA kf, sahasraDA kf#} &c.
.²26 To cause to become subject to, reduce completely to (a particular 
condition, with adverbs ending in {#sAt#}); {#AtmasAt kf#} to subject or
 appropriate to oneself; {#duritErapi kartumAtmasAtprayatante nfpasUnabo#}
 {#hi yat#} R. 8. 2; {#BasmasAt kf#} to reduce to ashes.
.²27 To appropriate, secure for oneself.
.²28 To help, give aid.
.²29 To make liable.
.²30 To violate or outrage (as a girl).
.²31 To begin.
.²32 To order.
.²33 To free from.
.²34 To proceed with, put in practice.
.²35 To worship, sacrifice.
.²36 To make like, consider equal to, cf. {#tfRIkf#} (said to be Ātm. 
only in the last 10 senses).
.²37 To take up, gather; {#AdAne karotiSabdaH#} Ms. 4. 2. 6; {#yaTA kAzWAni#}
 {#karoti gomayAni karoti iti AdAne karotiSabdo Bavati evamihApi drazwavyam#}
 ŚB. on MS. 4. 2. 6. This root is often used with nouns, adjectives, and
 indeclinables to form 
[Page0595-1]
 verbs from them, somewhat like the English affixes ‘en’ or ‘(i) fy’, in
 the sense of ‘making a person or thing to be what it previously is not’;
 e. g. {#kfzRIkf#} to make that which is not already black, black, 
i. e. blacken; so {#SvetIkf#} to whiten; {#GanIkf#} to solidify; {#viralIkf#}
 to rarefy &c. &c. Sometimes these formations take place in other senses
 also; e. g. {#kroqIkf#} ‘to clasp to the bosom’, embrace; {#BasmIkf#}
 to reduce to ashes; {#pravaRIkf#} to incline, bend; {#tfRIkf#} to value
 as little as straw; {#mandIkf#} to slacken, make slow; so {#SUlIkf#} to
 roast on the end of pointed lances; {#suKIkf#} to please; {#samayAkf#}
 to spend time &c. N. B.This root by itself admits of either Pada; 
but it is Ātm. generally with prepositions in the following senses:--(1)
 doing injury to; (2) censure, blame; (3) serving; (4) outraging, acting
 violently or rashly; (5) preparing, changing the condition of, turning
 into; (6) reciting; (7) employing, using; see P. I. 3. 32 and {#ganDanAvakzepaRasevanasAhasikyapratiyatnaprakaTanopayogezu#}
 {#kfYaH#} “Students' Guide to Sanskrit Composition” § 338. Note.
 The root {#kf#} is of the most frequent application in Sanskrit literature,
 and its senses are variously modified, or almost infinitely extended, 
according to the noun with which the root is connected; e. g. {#padaM#}
 {#kf#} to set foot (fig. also); {#ASrame padaM karizyasi#} Ś. 4. 19; {#krameRa#}
 {#kftaM mama vapuzi nava‡yOvanena padam#} K. 141; {#manasA kf#} to think
 of, meditate; {#manasi kf#} to think; {#dfzwvA manasyevamakarot#} K. 136;
 or to resolve or determine; {#saKyam, mEtrIM kf#} to form friendship with;
 {#astrARi kf#} to practise the use of weapons; {#daRqaM kf#} to inflict
 punishment; {#hfdaye kf#} to pay heed to; {#kAlaM kf#} to die; {#matiM-budDiM#}
 {#kf#} to think of, intend, mean; {#udakaM kf#} to offer libations of water
 to manes; {#ciraM kf#} to delay; {#darduraM kf#} to play on the lute; 
{#naKAni kf#} to clean the nails; {#kanyAM kf#} to outrage or violate a
 maiden; {#vinA kf#} to separate from, to be abandoned by, as in {#madanena#}
 {#vinAkftA ratiH#} Ku. 4. 21; {#maDye kf#} to place in the middle, to have
 reference to; {#maDyekftya sTitaM kraTakOSikAn#} M. 5. 2; {#vaSe kf#} 
to win over, place in subjection, subdue; {#camatkf#} to cause surprise;
 make an exhibition or a show; {#satkf#} to honour, treat with respect;
 {#tiryakkf#} to place aside. -Caus. ({#kArayati-te#}) To cause
 to do, perform, make, execute &c.; {#AjYAM kAraya rakzoBiH#} Bk. 8. 84;
 {#BftyaM Bftyena vA kawaM kArayati#} Sk. -Desid. ({#cikIrzati‡te#})

;; Case 1671: L=16600, k1=tul, code=€, mw=tul

5. 31; {#muKaM SlezmAgAraM tadapi ca SaSANkena tulitam#} Bh. 3. 20; Śi. 8. 12.
.²6 To match, be equal to (with acc.); {#prAsAdAstvAM tulayitumalaM yatra#}

.²7 To make light of, contemn, despise; {#antaH‡sAraM Gana tulayituM nAnilaH#}
 {#Sakzyati tvAm#} Me. 20 (where {#tul#} also means ‘to bear up’ or ‘carry
 away’); Śi. 15. 30.
.²8 To suspect, examine with distrust; {#kaH SradDAsyati BUtArTaM sarvo#}
 {#mAM tulayizyati#} Mk. 3. 24; 5. 43 (where some editions read {#tUlayizyati#}
 for {#tulayizyati#}).
.²9 To try, put to test, reduce to a wretched state; {#hA avasTe tulayasi#}
 Mk. 1 ({#tUlayasi#} v. l.)
.²10 To counter-balance, outweigh; {#tulayAma lavenApi na svargaM nApunarBavam#}

;; Case 1817: L=17942, k1=DA, code=€, mw=DA
{#DA#}¦ €3U. ({#daDAti, Datte, daDO-daDe, aDAt-aDita, DAsyati-te, DAtum,#}
 {#hita;#}) -pass. {#DIyate;#} -caus. {#DApayati-te;#} -desid. {#Ditsati-te#}
.²1 To put, place, set, lay, put in, lay on or upon; {#vijYAtadozezu daDAti#}

 {#Basmacaye padam#} H. 2. 132.

 gen., or loc.); {#DuryAM lakzmImaTa mayi BfSaM Dehi deva prasIda#} Māl.
 1. 3; {#yadyasya so'daDAtsarge tattasya svayamAviSat#} Ms. 1. 29.
.²4 To hold, contain; {#tAnapi daDAsi mAtaH#} Bv. 1. 68; Ś. 4. 4.
.²5 To seize, take hold of (as in the hand); {#DanurariBirasahyaM mfzwipIqaM#}
 {#daDAne#} Bk. 1. 26; 4. 26.
.²6 To wear, put on, bear; {#gurURi vAsAMsi vihAya tUrRaM tanUni#}......{#Datte#}
 {#janaH kAmamadAlasANgaH#} Rs. 6. 13, 16; {#Datte BaraM kusumapatraPalAvalInAm#}
 Bv. 1. 94; {#daDato maNgalakzOme#} R. 12. 8; 9. 40; Bk. 17. 54.
.²7 To assume, take, have, show, exhibit, possess; (usually Ātm.); {#kAcaH#}
 {#kAYcanasaMsargAdDatte mArakatIM dyutim#} H. Pr. 35; {#Sirasi masIpawalaM#}
 {#daDAti dIpaH#} Bv. 1. 74; R. 2. 7; Amaru. 27. 70; Me. 38; Bh. 3. 46; R.
 3. 1; Bk. 2. 1; 4. 16, 18; Śi. 9. 3; 10. 86; Ki. 5. 5.

{#PaREH#} Ku. 6. 68.
.²9 To support, maintain {#saMpadvinimayenoBO daDaturBuvanadvayam#} R. 1. 26.
.²10 To cause, create, produce, generate, make; {#mugDA kuqmalitAnanena#}
 {#daDatI vAyuM sTitA tatra sA#} Amaru. 72.
.²11 To suffer, undergo, incur; {#daDatI ratena BfSamutsukatAm#} Śi. 9. 2, 32, 66.
.²12 To perform, do.
.²13 Ved. To bring, convey.
.²14 To appoint, fix. [The meanings of this root, like those of {#dA,#}
 are variously modified according to the word with which it is connected;
 e. g. {#manaH, matim, Diyam,#} &c. {#DA#} to fix the mind or thoughts
 upon, resolve upon; {#padaM DA#} to set foot on, to enter; {#karRe karaM#}
 {#DA#} to place the hand on the ear &c.] -With {#api#} (the 
[Page0858-2]
 {#a#} being sometimes dropped).
.²1
.³(a) to close, shut; {#Dvanati maDupasamUhe SravaRamapidaDAti#} Gīt.
 5; so {#karRO-nayane-pidaDAti#}
.³(b) to cover, hide, conceal; {#prAyo mUrKaH pariBavaviDO nABimAnaM#}
 {#piDatte#} Ś. Til. 17 (v. l.); {#praBAvapihitA#} V. 4. 2; Śi. 9. 76; Bk. 7. 69.
.²2 to hinder, obstruct, bar; {#BujaMgapihitadvAraM pAtAlamaDi‡tizWati#}
 R. 1. 80. (The following verse illustrates the use of {#DA#} with some
 prepositions:- {#aDita kApi muKe salilaM saKI pyaDita kApi sarojadalEH#}
 {#stanO . vyaDita kApi hfdi vyajanAnilaM nyaDita kApi himaM sutanostanO#}
 N. 4. 111; or, better still, the following verse of Jagannātha:--
 {#niDAnaM DarmARAM kimapi ca viDAnaM navamudAM praDAnaM tIrTAnAmamalapariDAnaM#}
 {#trijagataH . samADAnaM budDeraTa Kalu tiroDAnamaDiyAM SriyAmADAnaM naH#}
 {#pariharatu tApaM tava vapuH ..#} G. L. 18).

;; Case 1818: L=17996, k1=DAv, code=C, mw=DAv
{#DAv#}¦ I. 1P. ({#DAvati, DAvita#})
.²1
.³(a) To run, advance; {#adyApi DAvati manaH#} Ch. P. 36; {#DAvantyamI#}
 {#mfgajavAkzamayeva raTyAH#} Ś. 1. 8; {#gacCati puraH SarIraM DAvati paScAdasaMstutaM#}
 {#cetaH#} ?1. 33.
.³(b) To move, glide.

;; Case 1835: L=18098, k1=Df, code=C, mw=Df
{#Df#}¦ I. 6 Ā. (Supposed by some to be a passive form of {#Df#}); ({#Driyate, Dfta#})
.²1 To be or exist, live, continue to live, survive; {#Aryaputra Driye #}
{#ezA Driye#} U. 3; {#Driyate yAvadeko'pi ripu‡stAvatkutaH suKam#} Śi. 2.
 35; 15. 89; {#nazwA SarIrEH kratuBirDarante#} Pt. ?1.

 {#muKe Driyate svedalavodgamo'pi te#} R. 8. 51; Ku. 4. 18.
.²3 To resolve upon. --II. 1P., 10 U. ({#Darati,#} usually {#DArayati-te,#}
 {#Dfta, DArita#})
.²1 To hold, bear, carry; {#BujaNgamapi kopitaM Sirasi puzpavadDArayet#}
 Bh. 2. 4; {#vERavIM DArayedyazwiM sodakaM ca kamaRqalum#} Ms. 4. 36; Bk.
 17. 54; V. 4. 36.
.²2 To hold or bear up, maintain, support, sustain; {#aBinavajalaDarasundara#}
 {#Dftamandara#}...... Gīt. 1. 2. 7; {#yaTA sarvARi BUtAni DarA DArayate#}
 {#samam#} Ms. 9. 311; Pt. 1. 126; {#prAtaHkundaprasavaSiTilaM jIvitaM DArayeTAH#}
 Me. 115; {#ciramAtmanA DftAm#} R. 3. 35; U. 3. 29.
.²3 To hold in one's possession, possess, have, keep; {#yA saMskftA DAryate#} Bh. 2. 19.
.²4 To assume, take (as a form, disguise &c.); {#keSava DftasUkararUpa#}
 Gīt. 1. 1. 4; {#DArayati kokanadarUpam#} 10. 4.
.²5 To wear, put on, use (clothes, ornaments &c.); {#SritakamalAkucamaRqala#}
 {#Dfta‡kuRqala e#} Gīt. 1. 2. 1.
.²6 To hold in check, curb, restrain, stop, detain; {#tvayA hi Darmo viDftaH#}
 {#kftsnaM DArayate jagat#} Mb. 1. 63. 5; {#daDAra droRamAyAntaM veleva saritAM#}
 {#patim#} Mb. 7. 16. 21.
.²7 To fix upon, direct towards; (with dat. or loc.) {#brAhmaRye DftamAnasaH,#}
 {#mano daDre rAjasUyAya#} &c.
.²8 To suffer, undergo.
.²9 To assign anything to any person, allot, assign.
.²10 To owe anything to a person (with dat.; rarely gen. of person, 10 
only in this sense); {#vfkzasecane dve DArayasi me#} Ś. 1; {#tasmE tasya#}
 {#vA DanaM DArayati#} &c.
.²11 To hold, contain.
.²12 To observe, practise.
.²13 To cite, quote.
.²14 To keep, retain (in one's service).
.²15 To preserve, maintain.
.²16 To seize, lay hold of.
.²17 To hold out or on, endure.
.²18 To fix, place, deposit.
.²19 To intend in mind; {#sa yadyadevAsfjata tattadattumADriyata#} Bṛ.
 Up. 1. 2. 5. (The senses of this root may be variously modified according
 to the noun with which it is connected; e. g. {#manasA Df#} to bear
 in mind, remember; {#SirasA, mUrDni Df#} to bear on the head, respect 
highly; {#antare Df#} to pledge, deposit anything as surety; {#samaye Df#}
 to bring to terms or agreement; {#daRqaM Df#} to punish, chastise, use
 force; {#jIvitam, prARAn, gAtram, SarIram, deham#} &c. {#Df#} to continue
 to live, maintain the soul &c.; preserve the vital spirits; {#vrataM Df#}
 to observe a vow; {#itTaM vrataM DArayataH prajArTam#} R. 2. 25; {#tulayA#}
 {#Df#} to hold in a balance, weigh &c.; {#manaH, matim, cittam, budDim Df#}
 to bend the mind to a thing, fix the mind upon, think of, resolve upon;
 {#garBaM Df#} to become pregnant, conceive; {#DAraRAM Df#} to practise
 concentration or self-control &c.)

;; Case 1869: L=18328, k1=nam, code=€, mw=nam
{#nam#}¦ €1P., sometimes Ā. ({#namati-te, nanAma, anaMsIt, naMsyati, #}

 {#yaTA nayatyasfkpAtErmfgasya mfgayuH padam#} 8. 44; Y. 2. 151.

.²11 To set in motion, set on foot. -Desid. ({#pipatizati#} or 
{#pitsati#}) To wish to fall. --II. 4 Ā. ({#patyate#}) Ved.
.²1 To be master of.
.²2 To rule, control.
.²3 To possess.

.²16 Ved. To be prosperous, succeed; {#tato devA aBavan#} Bṛ. Up. 1. 
3. 7; Mb. 12. 228. 1. Used with a preceding noun or adjective {#BU#} serves
 to form verbs in the sense of ‘becoming what it previously is not’ or 
‘becoming’ in general; {#SvetIBU#} to become white; {#kfzRIBU#} to become
 black; {#payoDarIBUta#} ‘becoming or serving the purpose of teats’; so
 {#kzapaRIBU#} to be or become a mendicant; {#praRiDIBU#} to act the spy;
 {#ArdrIBU#} to melt; {#BasmIBU#} to be reduced to ashes; {#vizayIBU#} 
to form the subject of; so {#ekamatIBU; taruRIBU#} &c. &c. Note--The
 senses of {#BU#} may be variously modified according to the adverbs with
 which it is connected; e. g. {#punarBU#} to marry again; {#AvirBU#}
 to appear, arise, to be evident or clear; see {#Avis; tiroBU#} to disappear;
 {#prAdurBU#} to arise, be visible, appear; {#agreBU#} to be in front, 
take the lead; {#antarBU#} to be absorbed or included; {#ojasyantarBavantyanye#}
 K. P. 8; {#dozABU#} to grow evening or dusk-time; {#anyaTA BU#} to be 
otherwise, be changed; {#na me vacanamanyaTA Bavitumarhati#} Ś. 4; {#puro#}

;; Case 2658: L=25392, k1=Bram, code=€, mw=Bram
{#Bram#}¦ €1, 4 P. ({#Bramati, Bramyati, BrAmyati, baBrAma, aBramat, aBra‡mIt,#}
 {#Bramizyati, Bramitum, BrAnta#}) 1 To roam or wander about, move or go 
about, rove, ramble (fig. also); {#Bramati Buvane kandarpAjYA#} Māl. 1.
 17; {#mano nizWASUnyaM Bramati ca kimapyAliKati ca#} 31; oft. with acc.
 of place; {#BuvaM baBrAma#} Dk.; {#digmaRqalaM Bramasi mAnasa cApalena#}
 Bh. 3. 77; so {#BikzAM Bram#} ‘to go about begging’.
.²2 To turn or whirl round, revolve, move round or in a circle; {#sUryo#}
 {#BrAmyati nityameva gagane#} Bh. 2. 95; {#BramatA BramareRa#} Gīt. 3.
.²3 To go astray, stray, swerve, deviate.
.²4 To spread, prevail, be current or afloat; {#aBramacca pOrajAnapadezviyaM vArtA#} Dk.
.²5 To totter, reel, stagger, be in doubt or suspense, waver; {#antarBinnaM#}
 {#Bramati hfdayam#} Māl. 5. 20.
.²6 To err, be in error or mistake, be mistaken; {#ABaraRakArastu tAlavya iti baBrAma#}.
.²7 To flicker, flutter, quiver, move unsteadily; {#cakzurBrAmyati#} Pt. 4. 78.
.²8 To surround.
.²9 To waver, be perplexed, doubt; {#tEraSvErBrAmyate BrAntEH sumAlI rAkzaseSvaraH#} 
[Page1215-1]
 Rām. 7. 7. 30. -Caus. ({#Bramayati-te#} or {#BrAmayati-te#})
.²1 To cause to rove or wander, cause to revolve or turn round, whirl round;
 {#Bramaya jaladAnamBogarBAn#} Māl. 9. 41.
.²2 To cause to err, delude, mislead, perplex, confuse, embarrass, cause
 to reel or stagger; {#vikAraScEtanyaM Bramayati ca saMmIlayati ca#} U. 1. 36.
.²3 To wave, brandish, vibrate; {#lIlAravindaM BramayAMcakAra#} R. 6. 13.
.²4 To proclaim by beat of drum.
.²5 To disarrange.

;; Case 2693: L=25678, k1=man, code=C, mw=man
{#man#}¦ I. 1 P. ({#manati#})

.²1 To be proud.

{#mene, amaMsta, maMsyate, mantum, mata#})
.²1 To think, believe, suppose, imagine, fancy, conceive; {#aNkaM ke'pi#}
 {#SaSaNkire jalaniDeH paNkaM pare menire#} Subhāṣ; {#batsa manye kumAreRAnena#}
 {#jfmBakAstramAmantritam#} U. 5; {#kaTaM BavAn manyate#} ‘what is your opinion’?
.²2 To consider, regard, deem, look upon, take (one) for, take to be; {#samIBUtA#}
 {#dfzwistriBuvanamapi trahma manute#} Bh. 3. 84; {#amaMsta cAnena parArDyajanmanA#}
 {#sTiteraBettA sTitimantamanvayam#} R. 3. 27; 1. 32; 6. 84; {#nityaM vA #}
{#manyase mftam#} Bg. 2. 26, 35; Bk. 9. 117; {#stanabinihitamapi hAramudAram#}
 {#. sA manute kfSatanuriva BAram#} Gīt. 4.
.²3 To honour, respect, value, esteem, think highly of, prize; {#yasyAnuzaNgiRa#}
 {#ime BuvanADipatyaBogAdayaH kfpaRalokamatA Bavanti#} Bh. 3. 76.
.²4 To know, understand, perceive, observe, have regard to; {#matvA devaM#}
 {#DanapatisaKaM yatra sAkzAdvasantam#} Me. 75.
.²5 To agree or consent to, act up to; {#tanmanyasva mama vacanam#} Mk. 8.
.²6 To think or reflect upon.
.²7 To intend, wish or hope for; {#striyaH kasmAdvaDaM vIra manyase rAkzaseSvara#}
 Rām. 6. 92. 60.
.²8 To set the heart or mind on.
.²9 To mention, declare.
.²10 To think out, devise, invent.
.²11 To be considered or regarded as, seem, appear like.
.²12 To accept, agree; {#kAlapASamahaM manye tvamapi drazwumarhasi#} Mb.
 17. 1. 3. (The senses of {#man#} are variously modified according to the
 word with which it is used; e. g. {#bahu man#} to think highly or 
much of, value greatly, prize, esteem; {#bahu manute nanu te tanusaMgatapabanacalitamapi#}
 {#reRum#} Gīt. 5; see under {#bahu#} also; {#laGu man#} to think lightly
 of, despise, slight; {#praTamopakftaM marutvataH pratipattyA laGu manyate#}
 {#BavAn#} Ś. 7. 1; {#anyaTA man#} to think otherwise; doubt; {#sADu man#}
 to think well of, approve, consider satisfactory; {#A paritozAdviduzAM#}
 {#na sADu manye prayogabijYAnam#} Ś. 1. 2; {#asADu man#} to disapprove;
 {#tfRAya man#} or {#tfRabat man#} to value at a straw, value lightly, 
[Page1233-1]
 make light of; {#harimapyamaMsata tfRAya#} Śi. 15. 61; {#na man#} to 
disregard, not to mind.) -Caus. ({#mAnayati-te#}) To honour, esteem,
 respect, pay respect to, value; {#mAnyAn mAnaya#} Bh. 2. 77; (Ātm.) to
 esteem one-self highly, prize highly. -Desid. ({#mImAMsate#})
.²1 To reflect upon, examine, investigate, inquire into.
.²2 To doubt, call in question (with loc.).

;; Case 2834: L=26960, k1=yA, code=€, mw=yA
{#yA#}¦ €2P. ({#yAti, yayO, ayAsIt, yAsyati, yAtum, yAta#})
.²1 To go, move, walk, proceed; {#yayO tadIyAmavalambya cANgulim#} R. 3.
 25; {#anvagyayO maDyamalokapAlaH#} 2. 16.
.²2 To march against, invade; {#tadA yAyAd vigfhyEva vyasane cotTite ripoH#} Ms. 7. 183.
.²3 To go to, march towards, set out for (with acc., dat. or with {#prati#}).
.²4 To pass away, withdraw, depart; {#yAtu prastutamanusaMDIyatAm#} H. 
3 ‘let it go or pass, never mind it’
.²5 To vanish, disappear; {#yAtastavApi ca vivekaH#} Bv. 1. 66; {#BAgyakrameRa#}
 {#hi DanAni Bavanti yAnti#} Mk. 1. 13.
.²6 To pass away or by, elapse (as time); {#yOvana‡manivarti yArtaM tu#} K. P. 10.
.²7 To last.
.²8 To happen, come to pass.
.²9 To go or be reduced to any state, be or become (usually with the acc.
 of abstract noun). 
[Page1308-2]
.²10 To undertake; {#na tvasya sidDO yAsyAmi sargavyApAramAtmanA#} Ku. 2. 54.
.²11 To have carnal intercourse with.
.²12 To request, implore.
.²13 To find out, discover.
.²14 To behave, act. (The meanings of {#yA,#} like those of {#gam,#} are
 variously modified according to the noun with which it is connected; e.
 g. {#nISaM yA#} to be destroyed; {#vAcyatAM yA#} to incur blame or censure;
 {#laGutAM yA#} to be slighted; {#prakftiM yA#} to regain one's natural
 state; {#nidrAM yA#} to fall asleep; {#vaSaM yA#} to submit, go into one's
 possession; {#udayaM yA#} to rise; {#astaM yA#} to set, decline; {#pAraM#}
 {#yA#} to reach the other side of, to master, surmount, get over; {#padaM#}
 {#yA#} to attain to the position of; {#agre yA#} to go before, take the 
lead, lead; {#aDo yA#} to sink; {#viparyAsaM yA#} to undergo a change, 
to be changed in appearance; {#SirasA mahIM yA#} to bend the head down 
to the ground &c.). -Caus. ({#yApayati-te#})
.²1 To cause to go or proceed.
.²2 To remove, drive away; {#pramadayA madayApitalajjayA#} R. 9. 31.
.²3 To spend, pass (time); {#tAvat kokila virasAn yApaya divasAn#} Bv. 1. 7; Me. 91.
.²4 To live or spend time with; {#vinayAdiva yApayanti te DftarAzwrAtmajamAtmasidDaye#} Ki. 2. 45.
.²5 To support, nourish.
.²6 To give sendoff; {#snehapraklinnahfdayo yApayAmAsa koSalaH#} Bhāg.
 10. 58. 52. -Desid. ({#yiyAsati#}) To wish to go, to be about 
to go &c. -With {#ati#}
.²1 to go beyond, transgress, violate.
.²2 to surpass. {#aDi#} to go away or forth; escape; {#kuto' DiyAsyasi #}
{#krUra nihatastena patriBiH#} Bk. 8. 90.

.²6 To perform, achieve.

.²8 To yoke, harness.

.²11 To surround.
.²12 To despise, think lightly of.

.²2 To be optional. -Caus.

.²3 To cause, produce; {#jyotsnASaNkAmiha vitarati haMsaSreRI#} Ki. 5. 31.
.²4 To carry over, ferry over.
.²5 To give (as medicine), apply a remedy.
.²6 To do, perform.
.²7 To forgive, pardon.
.²8 To increase, enhance. -Caus. To carry through, accomplish (fig. also).

;; Case 3292: L=30717, k1=vfD, code=C, mw=vfD
{#vfD#}¦ I. 1 Ā. (but Paras. also in the Second Future, Aorist and Conditional,

 {#vartsyati, vfdDa;#} desid. {#vivftsati,#} or {#vivarDizate#})
.²1 To grow, increase; become larger, stronger, or greater, thrive, prosper;
 {#anyonyajayasaMramBo vavfDe bAdinoriva#} R. 12. 92; 10. 78; {#Danakzaye#}
 {#varDati jAWarAgniH#} Subhāṣ.; Bk. 14. 13; 19. 26; Ms. 7. 136.
.²2 To continue, last.
.²3 To rise, ascend.
.²4 To have cause for congratulation, usually with {#dizwapA; dizwapA DarmapalI‡samAgamena#}
 {#putramuKadarSanena cAyuzmAn varDate#} Ś. 7 ‘your honour is to be congratulated
 upon your union &c.’ -Caus. ({#varDayati-te,#} also {#varDApayati-te#})

 {#tatkUwAnudDUtErDAtureRuBiH#} R. 4. 71.

 {#SAmyet pratyapakAreRa nopakAreRa durjanaH#} Ku. 2. 40; {#kAkutsTamuddiSya#}
 {#samatsaro'pi SaSAma tena kzitipAlalokaH#} R. 7. 3; {#SAnto labaH#} U. 
6. 7; Bh. 2. 75.
.²2 To cease, stop, come to an end; {#cintA#} 
[Page1534-1]
 {#SaSAma sakalA'pi saroruhARAm#} Bv. 3. 7; {#na jAtu kAmaH kAmAnAmupa‡Bogena#}
 {#SAmyati#} Ms. 2. 94 ‘is not satisfied’.
.²3 To be quelled, be extinguished or quenched; {#SaSAma vfzwayApi vinA#}
 {#davAgniH#} R. 2. 14; U. 5. 7.
.²4 To desist, leave off (speaking &c.).
.²5 To put an end to, destroy, kill (also 9 P. in this sense). -Caus.
 ({#Samayati-te,#} but {#SAmayati‡te#} in the sense of ‘seeing’, see {#Sam#}
 II). 1 To appease, allay, calm, tranquillize, pacify, soothe; {#kaH SItalEH#}
 {#SamayitA vacanEstavADim#} Bv. 3. 1; {#saMramBaM SamayAmAsa#} R. 15. 85;
 17. 55; Ś. 5. 7.
.²2 To put an end, to stop; {#vareRa SamitaM lokAnalaM dagDuM hi tattapaH#} Ku. 2. 56.
.²3 To remove, avert; {#pratikUlaM dEvaM Samayitum#} Ś. 1.
.²4 To subdue, tame, defeat, conquer, vanquish; {#Samayati gajAnanyAn ganDadvipaH#}
 {#kalaBo'pi san#} V. 5. 18; R. 9. 12; 11. 59.
.²5 To kill, destroy, slay; {#karRasyAtmajamagrataH SamayataH#} Ve. 5. 5.
.²6 To quench, extinguish; {#SamitakuruvaMSaprasavitA#} Pt. 4. 50; {#sutaptamapi#}
 {#pAnIyaM Samayatyeva pAvakam#} H. 1. 85; Me. 55.
.²7 To leave off, desist, cease. --II. 10 U. ({#SAmayati-te#})
.²1 To see, look at, inspect.
.²2 To show, display.
